blog.name: campdnp
blog.title: Camp Dan and Phil
blog.description:
Welcome to Camp Dan and Phil, a one week camp for all nerds in the Phandom that don’t like going outside!
Join our discord!
Header & icon by @infinitylester

summary: welcome to campdnp, the online summer camp for phandom members! if you’re curious about us, check out our original signup post...
body:
CAMPDNP SIGNUPS!!

welcome to campdnp, the online summer camp for phandom members! if you’re curious about us, check out our original signup post here! what matters now is that SIGNUPS CLOSE TOMORROW! so, if you want to sign up, you better do it quick! we’ve got over 50 people that are all super hyped to start camp in a couple weeks, and the more the merrier! 

camp is june 17-june 23, and signups close at 4PM EST; 8pm bst! on sunday, june 9! we’ll have tons of fun activities, like a scavenger hunt, a murder mystery, arts and crafts, and online games. you’ll be sorted into a tent with tons of awesome people and be able to have some competitive tent vs. tent fun (if you so choose).

if you’re interested, sign up NOW before it’s too late! we’re super hyped for camp this year!! 

-admins/counselors

SIGN UP HERE!!

blog.name: americanphancakes
blog.title: Irrelevant Peasant
blog.description: Zero, 35, she/her | AO3: americanphancakes | main: @deliriumzer0 | My cardcast DnP deck: 7GFBT play it it's funny

tags: i'm not entirely happy with the wording on some of these
but a lot of other dnp decks didnt even use the right grammar or style conventions
like the response cards were just random
and i wanted to make a deck thats a bit more professionally done
anyway i think the deck is pretty amusing
summary:
I think it might be big enough to play on its own now so HEY EVERYONE I've been making a thing for a few months!
The deck...
body:
Dan & Phil 2019 cardcast deck

I think it might be big enough to play on its own now so HEY EVERYONE I’ve been making a thing for a few months!

The deck consists chiefly of references to videos from after Dan stopped straightening his hair (though not exclusively). Most decks I found were all about their older branding so I made this!

See the Cardcast deck here. Code is 7GFBT if you wanna play with the deck in pyx.

Also, updates are ongoing so if you have card suggestions lmk!

blog.description: This blog is dedicated to remembering & archiving all of Dan & Phil's historic events. From old tweets & videos to iconic livestreams, reminisce it all on the daily here! Disclaimer: I own none of the gifs, all credit goes to their respective owners!

summary: This Day in Dan & Phil History - June 8
title: This Day in Dan & Phil History - June 8
body:
2013 - phils liveshow

2014 - the cheesecake incident

2015 - THREE-LEGGED DDR CHALLENGE

2016 - rip

2017 - democracy 2k17

2018 - the boys spend their day off from II in Berlin :)
